comments.html:
we looked two years ago at stacked switches. the biggest problem we saw was that when upgrading the firmware on the stack master it would automatically reboot all switches in the stack, effectively bringing down network connectivity to the whole rack even though servers had redundant links.

not sure if that's been fixed in the past two years on the various product lines though. just something to think about.
